name: Snake (itch) (x00F)
description:
Eat the apples that randomly generate on the screen, but don't run into yourself or the borders!

NOTE: It is possible to attempt to go inside of yourself, which counts as running into yourself, so a way to avoid that is to not press W / Up Arrow and S / Down Arrow in a rapid succession, and the same with left and right.

PC Only, Full screen recommended
